statements.statement: SELECT NVL(TD.TENDUOC, D.TENHANG) AS TENDUOC , LD.LOAIVATTU_ID , D.* , HL.ATTRIBUTE_15 AS HLQUYDOI , LVT.TENLOAIVATTU , DVT.TENDONVITINH , LD.TENLOAIDUOC , HSX.TENHANGSANXUAT , DIC.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENQUOCGIA , ND.TENNHOMDUOC , PND.TENPHANNHOMDUOC , PLD.TENPHANLOAIDUOC , DIC2.DICTIONARY_NAME AS DUONGDUNG , DIC3.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENLOAITHUEVAT , K.TENKHO , NPHG.TENNHOMPHATHANHGIA , DIC5.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENPHANLOAIBAOCAO , NCC.TENNHACUNGCAP , DIC6.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENLOAITHAU FROM TM_DUOC D LEFT JOIN TM_TENDUOC TD ON D.TENDUOC_ID = TD.TENDUOC_ID INNER JOIN TM_LOAIDUOC LD ON D.LOAIDUOC_ID = LD.LOAIDUOC_ID INNER JOIN TM_LOAIVATTU LVT ON LVT.LOAIVATTU_ID = LD.LOAIVATTU_ID AND LVT.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' LEFT JOIN TM_DONVITINH DVT ON DVT.DONVITINH_ID = D.DONVITINH_ID LEFT JOIN TM_HANGSANXUAT HSX ON HSX.HANGSANXUAT_ID = D.HANGSANXUAT_ID LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC ON DIC.DICTIONARY_ID = D.QUOCGIA_ID AND DIC.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'QuocGia' LEFT JOIN TM_NHOMDUOC ND ON ND.NHOMDUOC_ID = D.NHOMDUOC_ID LEFT JOIN TM_PHANNHOMDUOC PND ON PND.PHANNHOMDUOC_ID = D.PHANNHOMDUOC_ID LEFT JOIN TM_PHANLOAIDUOC PLD ON PLD.PHANLOAIDUOC = D.PHANLOAIDUOC AND PLD.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC2 ON DIC2.DICTIONARY_ID = D.DUONGDUNG_ID AND DIC2.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'DuongDung' LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC3 ON DIC3.DICTIONARY_ID = D.VAT AND DIC3.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'LoaiThueVAT' LEFT JOIN TM_DUOC_HAMLUONGCHITIET HL ON D.DUOC_ID = HL.DUOC_ID LEFT JOIN TM_KHODUOC K ON K.KHODUOC_ID = D.KHOQUANLY_ID LEFT JOIN TM_NHOMPHATHANHGIA NPHG ON NPHG.NHOMPHATHANHGIA_ID = D.NHOMPHATHANHGIA_ID AND LOAINHOM = 'Duoc' LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC5 ON DIC5.DICTIONARY_ID = D.PHANLOAIBAOCAO_ID AND DIC5.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'PhanLoaiBaoCaoDuoc' LEFT JOIN TM_NHACUNGCAP NCC ON NCC.NHACUNGCAP_ID = D.DONVITRUNGTHAU_ID LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC6 ON DIC6.DICTIONARY_ID = D.LOAITHAU_ID AND DIC6.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'LoaiThauDuoc' WHERE (NVL('$LOAIVATTU_ID$','') = '' OR LD.LOAIVATTU_ID = '$LOAIVATTU_ID$') AND D.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND (('$PHAMVI$' = 'BV' AND D.BENHVIEN = '1') OR ('$PHAMVI$' = 'NT' AND D.NHATHUOC = '1')) ORDER BY NVL(TD.TENDUOC, D.TENHANG)
statements.insert:
select TM_TENDUOC_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_TENDUOC ( TENDUOC_ID ,MATENDUOC ,TENDUOC ,TENDUOC_EN ,TENDUOC_RU ,MAQUOCTE ,MAQUOCTEBT ,LOAIVATTU_ID ,NHOMDUOC_ID ,MANHOMDUOCBT ,TAMNGUNG ,TENKHONGDAU ,NGAYTAO ,NGUOITAO_ID ,NGAYCAPNHAT ,NGUOICAPNHAT_ID ,BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #TENDUOC_ID# ,#MATENDUOC# ,#TENDUOC# ,#TENDUOC_EN# ,#TENDUOC_RU# ,#MAQUOCTE# ,#MAQUOCTEBT# ,#LOAIVATTU_ID# ,#NHOMDUOC_ID# ,#MANHOMDUOCBT# ,#TAMNGUNG# ,#TENKHONGDAU# ,#NGAYTAO# ,#NGUOITAO_ID# ,#NGAYCAPNHAT# ,#NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# ,#BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.statement: SELECT MAX(SUBSTR(MADUOC,5,LENGTH(MADUOC) - '$POSITION$')) AS MAX_NUMBER FROM TM_DUOC WHERE BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND SUBSTR(MADUOC,1,0 + '$POSITION$') = '$PREFIX$'

SELECT * FROM TM_DUOC_HOATCHAT
BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
MAHOATCHAT = '$MAHOATCHAT$'
HOATCHAT_ID = '$HOATCHAT_ID$'
SELECT * FROM TM_DUOC_THANHPHANHOATCHAT WHERE BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'

SELECT ATTRIBUTE1 AS TYLE FROM LST_DICTIONARY WHERE
DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'LoaiThueVAT' AND ENABLED = '1' AND DICTIONARY_ID = '$ID$'
statements.insert:
select TM_DUOC_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_DUOC ( DUOC_ID ,MADUOC ,MADUOCBV ,TENDUOC_ID ,DONVITINH_ID ,HAMLUONG ,QUOCGIA_ID ,HANGSANXUAT_ID ,LOAIDUOC_ID ,NHOMDUOC_ID ,PHANNHOMDUOC_ID ,PHANLOAIDUOC ,DUONGDUNG_ID ,NHOMPHATHANHGIA_ID ,SOVISA ,BHYT ,QUANTAMDACBIET ,CONGDUNG ,TAMNGUNG ,NGAYTAO ,NGUOITAO_ID ,NGAYCAPNHAT ,NGUOICAPNHAT_ID ,MAKETOAN ,SOTAIKHOAN ,SOTHAMCHIEU ,TAMNGUNGDUTRU ,TENHANG ,DONVITINH ,HANGSANXUAT ,QUOCGIA ,TENDUOCDAYDU ,AUTOCOMPLETEFIELD ,MAHOATCHAT ,TENHOATCHAT ,PHAMVI ,HOATCHAT_ID ,MADUOC_1 ,MADUOC_2 ,CACHSUDUNG ,HAMLUONGCHITIET ,KHOQUANLY_ID ,GHICHU ,VAT ,TYLE_VAT ,TINHTIEN ,TINHTIEN_PTTT ,KYGUI ,COTOA ,TT31 ,QUICACH_ID ,QC_GIATRIQUIDOI ,THOIGIANHOPDONG ,THUOCTHEOCHANDOAN ,BOYTE_DM27 ,DANGBAOCHE ,DANGTRINHBAY ,SODANGKYNHAPKHAU ,VTYTDANTEM ,VTYT_PHANLOAI ,DINHMUC ,BENHVIEN ,NHATHUOC ,DUONGDUNG_CODE ,NGAYAPDUNG ,DONVITRUNGTHAU_ID ,SO_QDTT ,LOAITHAU_ID ,GIATHAU ,SOLUONGTRUNGTHAU ,THONGTINTHAU ,PHANLOAIBAOCAO_ID ,STT_BHYT ,MA_BHYT ,BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# ,#MADUOC# ,#MADUOCBV# ,#TENDUOC_ID# ,#DONVITINH_ID# ,#HAMLUONG# ,#QUOCGIA_ID# ,#HANGSANXUAT_ID# ,#LOAIDUOC_ID# ,#NHOMDUOC_ID# ,#PHANNHOMDUOC_ID# ,#PHANLOAIDUOC# ,#DUONGDUNG_ID# ,#NHOMPHATHANHGIA_ID# ,#SOVISA# ,#BHYT# ,#QUANTAMDACBIET# ,#CONGDUNG# ,#TAMNGUNG# ,#NGAYTAO# ,#NGUOITAO_ID# ,#NGAYCAPNHAT# ,#NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# ,#MAKETOAN# ,#SOTAIKHOAN# ,#SOTHAMCHIEU# ,#TAMNGUNGDUTRU# ,#TENHANG# ,#DONVITINH# ,#HANGSANXUAT# ,#QUOCGIA# ,#TENDUOCDAYDU# ,#AUTOCOMPLETEFIELD# ,#MAHOATCHAT# ,#TENHOATCHAT# ,#PHAMVI# ,#HOATCHAT_ID# ,#MADUOC_1# ,#MADUOC_2# ,#CACHSUDUNG# ,#HAMLUONGCHITIET# ,#KHOQUANLY_ID# ,#GHICHU# ,#VAT# ,#TYLE_VAT# ,#TINHTIEN# ,#TINHTIEN_PTTT# ,#KYGUI# ,#COTOA# ,#TT31# ,#QUICACH_ID# ,#QC_GIATRIQUIDOI# ,#THOIGIANHOPDONG# ,#THUOCTHEOCHANDOAN# ,#BOYTE_DM27# ,#DANGBAOCHE# ,#DANGTRINHBAY# ,#SODANGKYNHAPKHAU# ,#VTYTDANTEM# ,#VTYT_PHANLOAI# ,#DINHMUC# ,#BENHVIEN# ,#NHATHUOC# ,#DUONGDUNG_CODE# ,#NGAYAPDUNG# ,#DONVITRUNGTHAU_ID# ,#SO_QDTT# ,#LOAITHAU_ID# ,#GIATHAU# ,#SOLUONGTRUNGTHAU# ,#THONGTINTHAU# ,#PHANLOAIBAOCAO_ID# ,#STT_BHYT# ,#MA_BHYT# ,#BENHVIEN_ID# )

select TM_DUOC_HAMLUONGCHITIET_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_DUOC_HAMLUONGCHITIET ( HAMLUONGCHITIET_ID ,DUOC_ID ,ATTRIBUTE_15 ) values ( #ID# ,#DUOC_ID# ,#HAMLUONG# )

insert into TM_DUOC_THANHPHANHOATCHAT ( DUOC_ID , HOATCHAT_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #DUOC_ID# , #HOATCHAT_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
SELECT #HOATCHAT_ID# as value from dual
statements.statement: delete from TM_DUOC_THANHPHANHOATCHAT where DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$' AND HOATCHAT_ID = '$HOATCHAT_ID$' AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
statements.update: UPDATE TM_TENDUOC SET MATENDUOC = #MATENDUOC# ,TENDUOC = #TENDUOC# ,TENDUOC_EN = #TENDUOC_EN# ,TENDUOC_RU = #TENDUOC_RU# ,MAQUOCTE = #MAQUOCTE# ,MAQUOCTEBT = #MAQUOCTEBT# ,LOAIVATTU_ID = #LOAIVATTU_ID# ,NHOMDUOC_ID = #NHOMDUOC_ID# ,MANHOMDUOCBT = #MANHOMDUOCBT# ,TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG# ,TENKHONGDAU = #TENKHONGDAU# ,NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# ,NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# ,BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# WHERE TENDUOC_ID = '$TENDUOC_ID$'

update TM_DUOC set MADUOC = #MADUOC# , MADUOCBV = #MADUOCBV# , TENDUOC_ID = #TENDUOC_ID# , DONVITINH_ID = #DONVITINH_ID# , HAMLUONG = #HAMLUONG# , QUOCGIA_ID = #QUOCGIA_ID# , HANGSANXUAT_ID = #HANGSANXUAT_ID# , LOAIDUOC_ID = #LOAIDUOC_ID# , NHOMDUOC_ID = #NHOMDUOC_ID# , PHANNHOMDUOC_ID = #PHANNHOMDUOC_ID# , PHANLOAIDUOC = #PHANLOAIDUOC# , DUONGDUNG_ID = #DUONGDUNG_ID# , NHOMPHATHANHGIA_ID = #NHOMPHATHANHGIA_ID# , SOVISA = #SOVISA# , BHYT = #BHYT# , QUANTAMDACBIET = #QUANTAMDACBIET# , CONGDUNG = #CONGDUNG# , TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , MAKETOAN = #MAKETOAN# , SOTAIKHOAN = #SOTAIKHOAN# , SOTHAMCHIEU = #SOTHAMCHIEU# , TAMNGUNGDUTRU = #TAMNGUNGDUTRU# , TENHANG = #TENHANG# , DONVITINH = #DONVITINH# , HANGSANXUAT = #HANGSANXUAT# , QUOCGIA = #QUOCGIA# , TENDUOCDAYDU = #TENDUOCDAYDU# , AUTOCOMPLETEFIELD = #AUTOCOMPLETEFIELD# , MAHOATCHAT = #MAHOATCHAT# , TENHOATCHAT = #TENHOATCHAT# , PHAMVI = #PHAMVI# , HOATCHAT_ID = #HOATCHAT_ID# , MADUOC_1 = #MADUOC_1# , MADUOC_2 = #MADUOC_2# , CACHSUDUNG = #CACHSUDUNG# , HAMLUONGCHITIET = #HAMLUONGCHITIET# , KHOQUANLY_ID = #KHOQUANLY_ID# , GHICHU = #GHICHU# , VAT = #VAT# , TYLE_VAT = #TYLE_VAT# , TINHTIEN = #TINHTIEN# , TINHTIEN_PTTT = #TINHTIEN_PTTT# , KYGUI = #KYGUI# , COTOA = #COTOA# , TT31 = #TT31# , QUICACH_ID = #QUICACH_ID# , QC_GIATRIQUIDOI = #QC_GIATRIQUIDOI# , THOIGIANHOPDONG = #THOIGIANHOPDONG# , THUOCTHEOCHANDOAN = #THUOCTHEOCHANDOAN# , BOYTE_DM27 = #BOYTE_DM27# , DANGBAOCHE = #DANGBAOCHE# , DANGTRINHBAY = #DANGTRINHBAY# , SODANGKYNHAPKHAU = #SODANGKYNHAPKHAU# , VTYTDANTEM = #VTYTDANTEM# , VTYT_PHANLOAI = #VTYT_PHANLOAI# , DINHMUC = #DINHMUC# , BENHVIEN = #BENHVIEN# , NHATHUOC = #NHATHUOC# , DUONGDUNG_CODE = #DUONGDUNG_CODE# , NGAYAPDUNG = #NGAYAPDUNG# , DONVITRUNGTHAU_ID = #DONVITRUNGTHAU_ID# , SO_QDTT = #SO_QDTT# , LOAITHAU_ID = #LOAITHAU_ID# , GIATHAU = #GIATHAU# , SOLUONGTRUNGTHAU = #SOLUONGTRUNGTHAU# , THONGTINTHAU = #THONGTINTHAU# , PHANLOAIBAOCAO_ID = #PHANLOAIBAOCAO_ID# , STT_BHYT = #STT_BHYT# , MA_BHYT = #MA_BHYT# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID#
VTYT_PHANLOAI = #VTYT_PHANLOAI#
where DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'
update TM_DUOC_HAMLUONGCHITIET set ATTRIBUTE_15 = #HAMLUONG# where DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TM_TENDUOC where TENDUOC_ID = '$TENDUOC_ID$'
delete from TM_DUOC where DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'
delete from TM_DUOC_HAMLUONGCHITIET where DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'

SELECT * FROM TM_LOAIDUOC
TM_LOAIDUOC.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
ORDER BY TM_LOAIDUOC.MALOAIDUOC

SELECT * FROM TM_HANGSANXUAT
TM_HANGSANXUAT.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
ORDER BY TM_HANGSANXUAT.MAHANGSANXUAT

SELECT * FROM TM_NHOMDUOC
TM_NHOMDUOC.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
ORDER BY TM_NHOMDUOC.MANHOMDUOC

SELECT * FROM TM_PHANNHOMDUOC
TM_PHANNHOMDUOC.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
ORDER BY TM_PHANNHOMDUOC.MAPHANNHOMDUOC
SELECT * FROM TM_NHOMPHATHANHGIA WHERE TM_NHOMPHATHANHGIA.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND TM_NHOMPHATHANHGIA.LOAINHOM = 'Duoc'

SELECT * FROM TM_PHANLOAIDUOC
TM_PHANLOAIDUOC.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
ORDER BY TM_PHANLOAIDUOC.PHANLOAIDUOC

SELECT MAHOATCHAT, TENHOATCHAT FROM TM_DUOC_HOATCHAT WHERE
HOATCHAT = '1' AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND LOAIVATTU_ID = '$LOAIVATTU_ID$'
SELECT KHODUOC_ID FROM TT_DUOC_TONKHO WHERE BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'
SELECT KHODUOC_ID, NGUONDUOC_ID FROM TT_DUOC_TONKHO WHERE BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'
SELECT * FROM LST_DICTIONARY WHERE DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'PhanLoaiBaoCaoDuoc' ORDER BY IDX
SELECT * FROM LST_DICTIONARY WHERE DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'LoaiThauDuoc' ORDER BY IDX

SELECT N.*, G.DESCRIPTION AS TENGIOITINH, DIC.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENQUOCGIA, PB.TENPHONGBAN , DIC2.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENCHUCVU, DIC3.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENCHUCDANH, N.TENNHANVIEN || ' (' || N.MANHANVIEN || ')' AS TENDAYDU , D.TENDONVICONGTAC, G.CODE AS MAGIOITINH FROM TM_NHANVIEN N LEFT JOIN TM_GENDER G ON G.ID = N.GIOITINH LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC ON DIC.DICTIONARY_ID = N.QUOCTICH_ID AND DIC.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'QuocGia' LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC2 ON DIC2.DICTIONARY_ID = N.CHUCVU_ID AND DIC2.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'ChucVu' LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC3 ON DIC3.DICTIONARY_ID = N.CHUCDANH_ID AND DIC3.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'ChucDanh' LEFT JOIN TM_DONVICONGTAC D ON D.DONVICONGTAC_ID = N.DONVICONGTAC_ID LEFT JOIN TM_PHONGBAN PB ON PB.PHONGBAN_ID = N.PHONGBAN_ID WHERE N.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
N.TAMNGUNG = '$ACTIVE$'
ORDER BY N.MANHANVIEN

select PB.* from TM_PHONGBAN PB inner join LST_DICTIONARY D on PB.LOAIPHONGBAN_ID = D.DICTIONARY_ID and D.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'LoaiPhongBan' and D.DICTIONARY_CODE IN ('KhamBenh','KhoaPhucVu','KhoaNoi','PhongMo','KhoaDuoc','KhoaCLS') where PB.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
select * from TM_DONVICONGTAC where BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
statements.insert:
select TM_NHANVIEN_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_NHANVIEN ( NHANVIEN_ID , MANHANVIEN , HO , TEN , TENNHANVIEN , TENNHANVIEN_RU , TENNHANVIEN_EN , TENTAT , NGAYSINH , GIOITINH , DIACHI , PHONGBAN_ID , DONVICONGTAC_ID , CHUCDANH_ID , CHUCVU_ID , TRINHDOCHUYENMON_ID , QUOCTICH_ID , TINHTHANH_ID , QUANHUYEN_ID , XAPHUONG_ID , DANTOC_ID , NGHENHIEP_ID , CMND , HOCHIEU , TRUCTIEPSX , TIEPXUCDOCHAI , TAMNGUNG , TENKHONGDAU , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , MADONVI , MA_BAC_SI , NGAYVAO , MANHANVIENNSTL , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #MANHANVIEN# , #HO# , #TEN# , #TENNHANVIEN# , #TENNHANVIEN_RU# , #TENNHANVIEN_EN# , #TENTAT# , #NGAYSINH# , #GIOITINH# , #DIACHI# , #PHONGBAN_ID# , #DONVICONGTAC_ID# , #CHUCDANH_ID# , #CHUCVU_ID# , #TRINHDOCHUYENMON_ID# , #QUOCTICH_ID# , #TINHTHANH_ID# , #QUANHUYEN_ID# , #XAPHUONG_ID# , #DANTOC_ID# , #NGHENHIEP_ID# , #CMND# , #HOCHIEU# , #TRUCTIEPSX# , #TIEPXUCDOCHAI# , #TAMNGUNG# , #TENKHONGDAU# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #MADONVI# , #MA_BAC_SI# , #NGAYVAO# , #MANHANVIENNSTL# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update: update TM_NHANVIEN set MANHANVIEN = #MANHANVIEN# , HO = #HO# , TEN = #TEN# , TENNHANVIEN = #TENNHANVIEN# , TENNHANVIEN_RU = #TENNHANVIEN_RU# , TENNHANVIEN_EN = #TENNHANVIEN_EN# , TENTAT = #TENTAT# , NGAYSINH = #NGAYSINH# , GIOITINH = #GIOITINH# , DIACHI = #DIACHI# , PHONGBAN_ID = #PHONGBAN_ID# , DONVICONGTAC_ID = #DONVICONGTAC_ID# , CHUCDANH_ID = #CHUCDANH_ID# , CHUCVU_ID = #CHUCVU_ID# , TRINHDOCHUYENMON_ID = #TRINHDOCHUYENMON_ID# , QUOCTICH_ID = #QUOCTICH_ID# , TINHTHANH_ID = #TINHTHANH_ID# , QUANHUYEN_ID = #QUANHUYEN_ID# , XAPHUONG_ID = #XAPHUONG_ID# , DANTOC_ID = #DANTOC_ID# , NGHENHIEP_ID = #NGHENHIEP_ID# , CMND = #CMND# , HOCHIEU = #HOCHIEU# , TRUCTIEPSX = #TRUCTIEPSX# , TIEPXUCDOCHAI = #TIEPXUCDOCHAI# , TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG# , TENKHONGDAU = #TENKHONGDAU# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , MADONVI = #MADONVI# , MA_BAC_SI = #MA_BAC_SI# , NGAYVAO = #NGAYVAO# , MANHANVIENNSTL = #MANHANVIENNSTL# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where NHANVIEN_ID = '$NHANVIEN_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TM_NHANVIEN where NHANVIEN_ID = '$NHANVIEN_ID$'

SELECT MG.*, TG.GIUONGTRONG AS TRANGTHAI, NVL(PB.TENPHONGBAN,MG.PHONGBENH_ID) AS TENPHONGBENH, NVL(PB2.TENPHONGBAN,MG.KHOADIEUTRI_ID) AS TENKHOADIEUTRI , (PB.TENPHONGBAN || '_' || NVL(PB2.TENPHONGBAN,'')) AS TENPHONGBAN FROM TM_GIUONGBENH MG LEFT JOIN TT_NOITRU_GIUONGBENH TG ON MG.GIUONGBENH_ID = TG.GIUONGBENH_ID LEFT JOIN TM_PHONGBAN PB ON MG.PHONGBENH_ID = PB.PHONGBAN_ID LEFT JOIN TM_PHONGBAN PB2 ON MG.KHOADIEUTRI_ID = PB2.PHONGBAN_ID WHERE MG.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
ORDER BY MG.MAGIUONG

SELECT PB.PHONGBAN_ID, (PB.TENPHONGBAN || ' - ' || PB.MAPHONGBAN) AS TENPHONGBAN FROM TM_PHONGBAN PB INNER JOIN LST_DICTIONARY D ON D.DICTIONARY_ID = PB.LOAIPHONGBAN_ID AND D.DICTIONARY_CODE IN ('KhoaNoi') WHERE PB.TAMNGUNG = 0 AND PB.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT PB.PHONGBAN_ID, (PB.TENPHONGBAN || ' - ' || PB.MAPHONGBAN) AS TENPHONGBAN, PB.CAPTREN_ID FROM TM_PHONGBAN PB INNER JOIN LST_DICTIONARY D ON D.DICTIONARY_ID = PB.LOAIPHONGBAN_ID AND D.DICTIONARY_CODE IN ('PhongBenh', 'KhamBenh') WHERE PB.TAMNGUNG = 0 AND PB.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT PB.PHONGBAN_ID, (PB.TENPHONGBAN || ' - ' || NVL(PB2.TENPHONGBAN,'')) AS TENPHONGBAN, PB.CAPTREN_ID, PB.TENPHONGBAN AS TENPHONGBENH, PB2.TENPHONGBAN AS TENKHOADIEUTRI FROM TM_PHONGBAN PB INNER JOIN LST_DICTIONARY D ON D.DICTIONARY_ID = PB.LOAIPHONGBAN_ID AND D.DICTIONARY_CODE IN ('PhongBenh') AND D.ENABLED = '1'
INNER JOIN TM_PHONGBAN PB2 ON PB2.PHONGBAN_ID = PB.CAPTREN_ID AND PB2.TAMNGUNG = '0' AND PB2.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' INNER JOIN LST_DICTIONARY D2 ON D2.DICTIONARY_ID = PB2.LOAIPHONGBAN_ID AND D2.DICTIONARY_CODE IN ('KhoaNoi') AND D2.ENABLED = '1'
WHERE PB.TAMNGUNG = 0 AND PB.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' ORDER BY PB2.TENPHONGBAN, PB.PHONGBAN_ID
statements.insert:
select TM_GIUONGBENH_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_GIUONGBENH ( GIUONGBENH_ID , MAGIUONG , KHOADIEUTRI_ID , PHONGBENH_ID , TANG , GIUONGTRONG , TAMNGUNG , MOTA , VATDUNGKEMTHEO , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #MAGIUONG# , #KHOADIEUTRI_ID# , #PHONGBENH_ID# , #TANG# , #GIUONGTRONG# , #TAMNGUNG# , #MOTA# , #VATDUNGKEMTHEO# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update: update TM_GIUONGBENH set MAGIUONG = #MAGIUONG# , KHOADIEUTRI_ID = #KHOADIEUTRI_ID# , PHONGBENH_ID = #PHONGBENH_ID# , TANG = #TANG# , GIUONGTRONG = #GIUONGTRONG# , TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG# , MOTA = #MOTA# , VATDUNGKEMTHEO = #VATDUNGKEMTHEO# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where GIUONGBENH_ID = '$GIUONGBENH_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TM_GIUONGBENH where GIUONGBENH_ID = '$GIUONGBENH_ID$'

SELECT TBL1.* FROM ( SELECT NCC.* , CASE WHEN NVL(NCC.NUOCNGOAI,'0') = '1' THEN 'Nước ngoài' WHEN NVL(NCC.NUOCNGOAI,'0') = '0' AND NVL(NCC.NHANUOC,'0') = '1' THEN 'Nhà nước' WHEN NVL(NCC.NUOCNGOAI,'0') = '0' AND NVL(NCC.NHANUOC,'0') = '0' AND NCC.LOAIHINHCONGTY_ID IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(D.DICTIONARY_NAME,N'Tư nhân') ELSE 'Tư nhân' END AS GROUP_DN , D.DICTIONARY_NAME AS LOAIHINHCONGTY_NAME FROM TM_NHACUNGCAP NCC LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY D ON D.DICTIONARY_ID = NCC.LOAIHINHCONGTY_ID AND D.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'LoaiHinhCongTy' AND D.ENABLED = '1' WHERE NCC.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' ) TBL1 WHERE NVL('$GROUP_DN$','') = '' OR TBL1.GROUP_DN = '$GROUP_DN$' ORDER BY TBL1.GROUP_DN

SELECT D.DICTIONARY_ID AS LOAIHINHCONGTY_ID, D.DICTIONARY_NAME AS LOAIHINHCONGTY_NAME FROM LST_DICTIONARY D WHERE D.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'LoaiHinhCongTy'
AND D.ENABLED = '1'

SELECT 'Nước ngoài' LOAIDOANHNGHIEP_ID, 'Nước ngoài' AS LOAIDOANHNGHIEP_NAME from dual UNION ALL SELECT 'Nhà nước' LOAIDOANHNGHIEP_ID, 'Nhà nước' AS LOAIDOANHNGHIEP_NAME from dual UNION ALL SELECT 'Tư nhân' LOAIDOANHNGHIEP_ID, 'Tư nhân' AS LOAIDOANHNGHIEP_NAME from dual UNION ALL SELECT D.DICTIONARY_NAME LOAIDOANHNGHIEP_ID, D.DICTIONARY_NAME AS LOAIDOANHNGHIEP_NAME FROM LST_DICTIONARY D WHERE D.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'LoaiHinhCongTy'
AND D.ENABLED = '1'
statements.insert:
select TM_NHACUNGCAP_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_NHACUNGCAP ( NHACUNGCAP_ID , MANHACUNGCAP , TENNHACUNGCAP , TENNHACUNGCAP_EN , TENNHACUNGCAP_RU , DIACHI , DIENTHOAI , FAX , EMAIL , MASOTHUE , GIAMDOC , NGUOILIENHE , NUOCNGOAI , NHANUOC , TAMNGUNG , TENKHONGDAU , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , HESO , PH_DUOC , PH_NHM , PH_TAISAN , LOAIHINHCONGTY_ID , PH_VPP , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #MANHACUNGCAP# , #TENNHACUNGCAP# , #TENNHACUNGCAP_EN# , #TENNHACUNGCAP_RU# , #DIACHI# , #DIENTHOAI# , #FAX# , #EMAIL# , #MASOTHUE# , #GIAMDOC# , #NGUOILIENHE# , #NUOCNGOAI# , #NHANUOC# , #TAMNGUNG# , #TENKHONGDAU# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #HESO# , #PH_DUOC# , #PH_NHM# , #PH_TAISAN# , #LOAIHINHCONGTY_ID# , #PH_VPP# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update: update TM_NHACUNGCAP set MANHACUNGCAP = #MANHACUNGCAP# , TENNHACUNGCAP = #TENNHACUNGCAP# , TENNHACUNGCAP_EN = #TENNHACUNGCAP_EN# , TENNHACUNGCAP_RU = #TENNHACUNGCAP_RU# , DIACHI = #DIACHI# , DIENTHOAI = #DIENTHOAI# , FAX = #FAX# , EMAIL = #EMAIL# , MASOTHUE = #MASOTHUE# , GIAMDOC = #GIAMDOC# , NGUOILIENHE = #NGUOILIENHE# , NUOCNGOAI = #NUOCNGOAI# , NHANUOC = #NHANUOC# , TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG# , TENKHONGDAU = #TENKHONGDAU# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , HESO = #HESO# , PH_DUOC = #PH_DUOC# , PH_NHM = #PH_NHM# , PH_TAISAN = #PH_TAISAN# , LOAIHINHCONGTY_ID = #LOAIHINHCONGTY_ID# , PH_VPP = #PH_VPP# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where NHACUNGCAP_ID = '$NHACUNGCAP_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TM_NHACUNGCAP where NHACUNGCAP_ID = '$NHACUNGCAP_ID$'

SELECT NHACUNGCAP_ID FROM TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU WHERE NHACUNGCAP_ID = '$NHACUNGCAP_ID$' AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND ROWNUM = 1 UNION ALL SELECT NHACUNGCAP_ID FROM TT_DUOC_DUTRU_CHITIET WHERE NHACUNGCAP_ID = '$NHACUNGCAP_ID$' AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT D.DUOC_ID, D.MADUOC, D.HAMLUONG, TD.TENDUOC, LD.TENLOAIDUOC, DVT.TENDONVITINH, HSX.TENHANGSANXUAT, DIC.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENQUOCGIA , CASE NVL(DN.ID,-1) WHEN -1 THEN '0' ELSE '1' END AS SELECTED FROM TM_DUOC D INNER JOIN TM_TENDUOC TD ON D.TENDUOC_ID = TD.TENDUOC_ID INNER JOIN TM_LOAIDUOC LD ON D.LOAIDUOC_ID = LD.LOAIDUOC_ID AND (NVL('$LOAIVATTU_ID$','') = '' OR LD.LOAIVATTU_ID = '$LOAIVATTU_ID$') INNER JOIN TM_DONVITINH DVT ON DVT.DONVITINH_ID = D.DONVITINH_ID LEFT JOIN TM_HANGSANXUAT HSX ON HSX.HANGSANXUAT_ID = D.HANGSANXUAT_ID LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC ON DIC.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'QuocGia' AND DIC.ENABLED = '1' AND D.QUOCGIA_ID = DIC.DICTIONARY_ID LEFT JOIN TM_DUOC_NGUONHANG DN ON D.DUOC_ID = DN.DUOC_ID AND DN.NGUONHANG_ID = '$NGUONHANG_ID$' WHERE D.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND D.TAMNGUNG = '0'
SELECT NGUONDUOC_ID AS NGUONHANG_ID, TENNGUONDUOC AS TENNGUONHANG FROM TM_NGUONHANG WHERE TAMNGUNG = '0' AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
SELECT * FROM TM_DUOC_NGUONHANG WHERE BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$' AND NGUONHANG_ID = '$NGUONHANG_ID$'
statements.insert:
select TM_DUOC_NGUONHANG_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_DUOC_NGUONHANG ( ID , DUOC_ID , NGUONHANG_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #DUOC_ID# , #NGUONHANG_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update: update TM_DUOC_NGUONHANG set DUOC_ID = #DUOC_ID# , NGUONHANG_ID = #NGUONHANG_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where ID = '$ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TM_DUOC_NGUONHANG where ID = '$ID$'

SELECT D.DUOC_ID, D.MADUOC, D.HAMLUONG, TD.TENDUOC, LD.TENLOAIDUOC, DVT.TENDONVITINH, HSX.TENHANGSANXUAT, DIC.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENQUOCGIA , CASE NVL(DP.DUOC_PHAMVI_ID,-1) WHEN -1 THEN '0' ELSE '1' END AS SELECTED FROM TM_DUOC D INNER JOIN TM_TENDUOC TD ON D.TENDUOC_ID = TD.TENDUOC_ID INNER JOIN TM_LOAIDUOC LD ON D.LOAIDUOC_ID = LD.LOAIDUOC_ID INNER JOIN TM_DONVITINH DVT ON DVT.DONVITINH_ID = D.DONVITINH_ID LEFT JOIN TM_HANGSANXUAT HSX ON HSX.HANGSANXUAT_ID = D.HANGSANXUAT_ID LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC ON DIC.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'QuocGia' AND DIC.ENABLED = '1' AND D.QUOCGIA_ID = DIC.DICTIONARY_ID LEFT JOIN TM_DUOC_PHAMVI DP ON D.DUOC_ID = DP.DUOC_ID AND DP.PHAMVI_ID = '$PHAMVI_ID$' WHERE D.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND D.TAMNGUNG = '0' AND (NVL('$LOAIVATTU_ID$','') = '' OR LD.LOAIVATTU_ID = '$LOAIVATTU_ID$')
SELECT PHAMVI_ID, TENPHAMVI FROM TM_PHAMVI WHERE TAMNGUNG = '0' AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
SELECT * FROM TM_DUOC_PHAMVI WHERE BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$' AND PHAMVI_ID = '$PHAMVI_ID$'
statements.insert:
select TM_DUOC_PHAMVI_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_DUOC_PHAMVI ( DUOC_PHAMVI_ID , DUOC_ID , PHAMVI_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #DUOC_ID# , #PHAMVI_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update: update TM_DUOC_PHAMVI set DUOC_ID = #DUOC_ID# , PHAMVI_ID = #PHAMVI_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where DUOC_PHAMVI_ID = '$DUOC_PHAMVI_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TM_DUOC_PHAMVI where DUOC_PHAMVI_ID = '$DUOC_PHAMVI_ID$'

SELECT D.DUOC_ID, D.MADUOC, D.HAMLUONG, TD.TENDUOC, LD.TENLOAIDUOC, DVT.TENDONVITINH, HSX.TENHANGSANXUAT, DIC.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENQUOCGIA , CASE NVL(DN.DM_DUOC_NOIPHATHANH_ID,-1) WHEN -1 THEN '0' ELSE '1' END AS SELECTED FROM TM_DUOC D INNER JOIN TM_TENDUOC TD ON D.TENDUOC_ID = TD.TENDUOC_ID INNER JOIN TM_LOAIDUOC LD ON D.LOAIDUOC_ID = LD.LOAIDUOC_ID INNER JOIN TM_DONVITINH DVT ON DVT.DONVITINH_ID = D.DONVITINH_ID INNER JOIN TM_HANGSANXUAT HSX ON HSX.HANGSANXUAT_ID = D.HANGSANXUAT_ID INNER JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC ON DIC.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'QuocGia' AND DIC.ENABLED = '1' AND D.QUOCGIA_ID = DIC.DICTIONARY_ID LEFT JOIN TM_DUOC_NOIPHATHANH DN ON D.DUOC_ID = DN.DUOC_ID AND DN.KHODUOC_ID = '$KHODUOC_ID$' WHERE D.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND D.TAMNGUNG = '0' AND (NVL('$LOAIVATTU_ID$','') = '' OR LD.LOAIVATTU_ID = '$LOAIVATTU_ID$')
SELECT KHODUOC_ID, (MAKHO || '_' || TENKHO) AS TENNOIPHATHANH FROM TM_KHODUOC WHERE TAMNGUNG = '0' AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
SELECT * FROM TM_DUOC_NOIPHATHANH WHERE BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$' AND KHODUOC_ID = '$KHODUOC_ID$'
statements.insert:
select TM_DUOC_NOIPHATHANH_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_DUOC_NOIPHATHANH ( DM_DUOC_NOIPHATHANH_ID , KHODUOC_ID , DUOC_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , ATTRIBUTE_1 , ATTRIBUTE_2 , ATTRIBUTE_3 , ATTRIBUTE_4 , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #KHODUOC_ID# , #DUOC_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #ATTRIBUTE_1# , #ATTRIBUTE_2# , #ATTRIBUTE_3# , #ATTRIBUTE_4# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update: update TM_DUOC_NOIPHATHANH set KHODUOC_ID = #KHODUOC_ID# , DUOC_ID = #DUOC_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , ATTRIBUTE_1 = #ATTRIBUTE_1# , ATTRIBUTE_2 = #ATTRIBUTE_2# , ATTRIBUTE_3 = #ATTRIBUTE_3# , ATTRIBUTE_4 = #ATTRIBUTE_4# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where DM_DUOC_NOIPHATHANH_ID = '$DM_DUOC_NOIPHATHANH_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TM_DUOC_NOIPHATHANH where DM_DUOC_NOIPHATHANH_ID = '$DM_DUOC_NOIPHATHANH_ID$'

SELECT K.KHODUOC_ID, K.MAKHO, K.TENKHO AS TENKHODUOC , CASE NVL(PVB.DM_PHAMVIBOOKING_KHODUOC_ID,-1) WHEN -1 THEN '0' ELSE '1' END AS SELECTED , NVL(D.DICTIONARY_NAME,'') AS TENPHAMVIBOOKING FROM TM_KHODUOC K LEFT JOIN TM_PHAMVIBOOKING_KHODUOC PVB ON K.KHODUOC_ID = PVB.KHODUOC_ID AND PVB.PHAMVI_ID = '$PHAMVIBOOKING_ID$' LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY D ON D.ENABLED = '1'
AND D.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'PhamVi_BookingDuoc' AND PVB.PHAMVI_ID = D.DICTIONARY_ID WHERE K.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND K.TAMNGUNG = '0'

SELECT D.DICTIONARY_ID AS PHAMVIBOOKING_ID, D.DICTIONARY_NAME AS PHAMVIBOOKING_NAME FROM LST_DICTIONARY D WHERE ENABLED = '1'
AND DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'PhamVi_BookingDuoc'
SELECT * FROM TM_PHAMVIBOOKING_KHODUOC WHERE BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND KHODUOC_ID = '$KHODUOC_ID$' AND PHAMVI_ID = '$PHAMVIBOOKING_ID$'
statements.insert:
select TM_PHAMVIBOOKING_KHODUOC_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_PHAMVIBOOKING_KHODUOC ( DM_PHAMVIBOOKING_KHODUOC_ID , PHAMVI_ID , KHODUOC_ID , GHICHU , TAMNGUNG , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #PHAMVIBOOKING_ID# , #KHODUOC_ID# , #GHICHU# , #TAMNGUNG# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update: update TM_PHAMVIBOOKING_KHODUOC set PHAMVI_ID = #PHAMVIBOOKING_ID# , KHODUOC_ID = #KHODUOC_ID# , GHICHU = #GHICHU# , TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where DM_PHAMVIBOOKING_KHODUOC_ID = '$DM_PHAMVIBOOKING_KHODUOC_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TM_PHAMVIBOOKING_KHODUOC where DM_PHAMVIBOOKING_KHODUOC_ID = '$DM_PHAMVIBOOKING_KHODUOC_ID$'

SELECT D.*, $LIST_LOAIPHAUTHUAT$ FROM TM_DICHVU D LEFT JOIN TM_PHANLOAIPHAUTHUAT PL ON D.DICHVU_ID = PL.DICHVU_ID WHERE D.TAMNGUNG = '0' AND D.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND D.NHOMDICHVU_ID = '$NHOMDICHVU_ID$'
SELECT NHOMDICHVU_ID, TENNHOMDICHVU, LOAIDICHVU_ID FROM TM_NHOMDICHVU WHERE TAMNGUNG = '0' AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
SELECT LOAIDICHVU_ID, TENLOAIDICHVU FROM TM_LOAIDICHVU WHERE TAMNGUNG = '0' AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
SELECT PL.* FROM TM_PHANLOAIPHAUTHUAT PL WHERE PL.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND PL.DICHVU_ID = '$DICHVU_ID$'
statements.insert:
select TM_PHANLOAIPHAUTHUAT_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_PHANLOAIPHAUTHUAT ( PHANLOAIPHAUTHUAT_ID ,DICHVU_ID , LOAIPHAUTHUAT , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #DICHVU_ID# , #LOAIPHAUTHUAT# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update: update TM_PHANLOAIPHAUTHUAT set DICHVU_ID = #DICHVU_ID# , LOAIPHAUTHUAT = #LOAIPHAUTHUAT# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where PHANLOAIPHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHANLOAIPHAUTHUAT_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TM_PHANLOAIPHAUTHUAT where PHANLOAIPHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHANLOAIPHAUTHUAT_ID$'

SELECT NV.*, NVU.USER_ID, PB.TENPHONGBAN, NVU.NHANVIEN_USER_ID , U.ACCOUNT_NAME AS USER_NAME, G.DESCRIPTION AS TENGIOITINH , DIC.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENQUOCGIA , DIC2.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENCHUCVU, DIC3.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENCHUCDANH FROM TM_NHANVIEN NV LEFT JOIN TM_NHANVIEN_USER_MAPPING NVU ON NVU.NHANVIEN_ID = NV.NHANVIEN_ID LEFT JOIN TM_SYS_USERS U ON NVU.USER_ID = U.ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN TM_PHONGBAN PB ON PB.PHONGBAN_ID = NV.PHONGBAN_ID INNER JOIN TM_GENDER G ON G.ID = NV.GIOITINH LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC ON DIC.DICTIONARY_ID = NV.QUOCTICH_ID AND DIC.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'QuocGia' LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC2 ON DIC2.DICTIONARY_ID = NV.CHUCVU_ID AND DIC2.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'ChucVu' LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC3 ON DIC3.DICTIONARY_ID = NV.CHUCDANH_ID AND DIC3.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'ChucDanh' WHERE NV.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND NV.TAMNGUNG = '0' ORDER BY NV.MANHANVIEN

select PB.* from TM_PHONGBAN PB inner join LST_DICTIONARY D on PB.LOAIPHONGBAN_ID = D.DICTIONARY_ID and D.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'LoaiPhongBan' and D.DICTIONARY_CODE IN ('KhamBenh','KhoaPhucVu','KhoaNoi','PhongMo','KhoaDuoc','KhoaCLS') where PB.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
select U.* from TM_SYS_USERS U where U.HOSPITAL_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
statements.insert:
select TM_NHANVIEN_USER_MAPPING_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_NHANVIEN_USER_MAPPING ( NHANVIEN_USER_ID , NHANVIEN_ID , USER_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #NHANVIEN_ID# , #USER_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update: update TM_NHANVIEN_USER_MAPPING set NHANVIEN_ID = #NHANVIEN_ID# , USER_ID = #USER_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where NHANVIEN_USER_ID = '$NHANVIEN_USER_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TM_NHANVIEN_USER_MAPPING where NHANVIEN_USER_ID = '$NHANVIEN_USER_ID$'
SELECT NVU.* FROM TM_NHANVIEN_USER_MAPPING NVU WHERE NVU.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND NVU.NHANVIEN_ID = '$NHANVIEN_ID$'
select * from TM_NHANVIENBENNGOAI where TAMNGUNG = 0

SELECT NV.*, G.DESCRIPTION AS TENGIOITINH, DIC3.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENCHUCDANH FROM TM_NHANVIENBENNGOAI NV INNER JOIN TM_GENDER G ON G.ID = NV.GIOITINH LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC3 ON DIC3.DICTIONARY_ID = NV.CHUCDANH_ID AND DIC3.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'ChucDanh' WHERE NV.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' ORDER BY NV.MANHANVIEN
statements.insert:
select TM_NHANVIENBENNGOAI_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_NHANVIENBENNGOAI ( NHANVIEN_USER_ID , MANHANVIEN , HO , TEN , TENNHANVIEN , TENNHANVIEN_RU , TENNHANVIEN_EN , TENTAT , NGAYSINH , GIOITINH , DIACHI , PHONGBAN_ID , DONVICONGTAC_ID , CHUCDANH_ID , CHUCVU_ID , TRINHDOCHUYENMON_ID , QUOCTICH_ID , TINHTHANH_ID , QUANHUYEN_ID , XAPHUONG_ID , DANTOC_ID , NGHENHIEP_ID , CMND , HOCHIEU , TRUCTIEPSX , TIEPXUCDOCHAI , TAMNGUNG , TENKHONGDAU , MADONVI , NGAYVAO , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #MANHANVIEN# , #HO# , #TEN# , #TENNHANVIEN# , #TENNHANVIEN_RU# , #TENNHANVIEN_EN# , #TENTAT# , #NGAYSINH# , #GIOITINH# , #DIACHI# , #PHONGBAN_ID# , #DONVICONGTAC_ID# , #CHUCDANH_ID# , #CHUCVU_ID# , #TRINHDOCHUYENMON_ID# , #QUOCTICH_ID# , #TINHTHANH_ID# , #QUANHUYEN_ID# , #XAPHUONG_ID# , #DANTOC_ID# , #NGHENHIEP_ID# , #CMND# , #HOCHIEU# , #TRUCTIEPSX# , #TIEPXUCDOCHAI# , #TAMNGUNG# , #TENKHONGDAU# , #MADONVI# , #NGAYVAO# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update: update TM_NHANVIENBENNGOAI set MANHANVIEN = #MANHANVIEN# , HO = #HO# , TEN = #TEN# , TENNHANVIEN = #TENNHANVIEN# , TENNHANVIEN_RU = #TENNHANVIEN_RU# , TENNHANVIEN_EN = #TENNHANVIEN_EN# , TENTAT = #TENTAT# , NGAYSINH = #NGAYSINH# , GIOITINH = #GIOITINH# , DIACHI = #DIACHI# , PHONGBAN_ID = #PHONGBAN_ID# , DONVICONGTAC_ID = #DONVICONGTAC_ID# , CHUCDANH_ID = #CHUCDANH_ID# , CHUCVU_ID = #CHUCVU_ID# , TRINHDOCHUYENMON_ID = #TRINHDOCHUYENMON_ID# , QUOCTICH_ID = #QUOCTICH_ID# , TINHTHANH_ID = #TINHTHANH_ID# , QUANHUYEN_ID = #QUANHUYEN_ID# , XAPHUONG_ID = #XAPHUONG_ID# , DANTOC_ID = #DANTOC_ID# , NGHENHIEP_ID = #NGHENHIEP_ID# , CMND = #CMND# , HOCHIEU = #HOCHIEU# , TRUCTIEPSX = #TRUCTIEPSX# , TIEPXUCDOCHAI = #TIEPXUCDOCHAI# , TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG# , TENKHONGDAU = #TENKHONGDAU# , MADONVI = #MADONVI# , NGAYVAO = #NGAYVAO# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where NHANVIEN_ID = '$NHANVIEN_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TM_NHANVIENBENNGOAI where NHANVIEN_ID = '$NHANVIEN_ID$'

SELECT NV.NHANVIEN_ID, NV.MANHANVIEN, NV.TENNHANVIEN, NV.NGAYSINH, NV.GIOITINH, NV.DIACHI, NV.NGAYVAO, NV.QUOCTICH_ID , NV.PHONGBAN_ID, NV.CHUCVU_ID, NV.CHUCDANH_ID, NV.DONVICONGTAC_ID, NVT.SOTHE, NVT.MATHE, NVL(NVT.TAMNGUNG,'0') AS TAMNGUNG, PB.TENPHONGBAN , G.DESCRIPTION TENGIOITINH, DIC.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENQUOCGIA , DIC2.DICTIONARY_NAME TENCHUCVU, DIC3.DICTIONARY_NAME AS TENCHUCDANH , D.TENDONVICONGTAC FROM TM_NHANVIEN NV LEFT JOIN TM_NHANVIEN_THE NVT ON NV.NHANVIEN_ID = NVT.NHANVIEN_ID AND NVT.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' INNER JOIN TM_PHONGBAN PB ON PB.PHONGBAN_ID = NV.PHONGBAN_ID AND PB.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' INNER JOIN TM_GENDER G ON G.ID = NV.GIOITINH LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC ON DIC.DICTIONARY_ID = NV.QUOCTICH_ID AND DIC.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'QuocGia' LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC2 ON DIC2.DICTIONARY_ID = NV.CHUCVU_ID AND DIC2.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'ChucVu' LEFT JOIN LST_DICTIONARY DIC3 ON DIC3.DICTIONARY_ID = NV.CHUCDANH_ID AND DIC3.DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'ChucDanh' LEFT JOIN TM_DONVICONGTAC D ON D.DONVICONGTAC_ID = NV.DONVICONGTAC_ID WHERE NV.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' ORDER BY NV.MANHANVIEN
SELECT * FROM TM_NHANVIEN_THE NVT WHERE NVT.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND NVT.NHANVIEN_ID = '$NHANVIEN_ID$'
statements.insert:
select TM_NHANVIEN_THE_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_NHANVIEN_THE ( NHANVIEN_THE_ID , NHANVIEN_ID , SOTHE , MATHE , TAMNGUNG , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #NHANVIEN_ID# , #SOTHE# , #MATHE# , #TAMNGUNG# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update: update TM_NHANVIEN_THE set NHANVIEN_ID = #NHANVIEN_ID# , SOTHE = #SOTHE# , MATHE = #MATHE# , TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where NHANVIEN_THE_ID = '$NHANVIEN_THE_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TM_NHANVIEN_THE where NHANVIEN_THE_ID = '$NHANVIEN_THE_ID$'

SELECT DT.DOITUONG_ID, DT.TENDOITUONG, DTK1.KHODUOC_ID AS CHUNHAT, DTK2.KHODUOC_ID AS THUHAI, DTK3.KHODUOC_ID AS THUBA , DTK4.KHODUOC_ID AS THUTU, DTK5.KHODUOC_ID AS THUNAM, DTK6.KHODUOC_ID AS THUSAU, DTK7.KHODUOC_ID AS THUBAY, 'DEL' AS XOA , KD1.TENKHO AS CHUNHATKHO, KD2.TENKHO AS THUHAIKHO, KD3.TENKHO AS THUBAKHO, KD4.TENKHO AS THUTUKHO , KD5.TENKHO AS THUNAMKHO, KD6.TENKHO AS THUSAUKHO, KD7.TENKHO AS THUBAYKHO FROM TM_DOITUONG DT LEFT JOIN TM_DOITUONG_KHODUOC DTK1 ON DTK1.DOITUONG_ID = DT.DOITUONG_ID AND DTK1.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND DTK1.NGAYTRONGTUAN = 1 LEFT JOIN TM_KHODUOC KD1 ON KD1.KHODUOC_ID = DTK1.KHODUOC_ID LEFT JOIN TM_DOITUONG_KHODUOC DTK2 ON DTK2.DOITUONG_ID = DT.DOITUONG_ID AND DTK2.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND DTK2.NGAYTRONGTUAN = 2 LEFT JOIN TM_KHODUOC KD2 ON KD2.KHODUOC_ID = DTK2.KHODUOC_ID LEFT JOIN TM_DOITUONG_KHODUOC DTK3 ON DTK3.DOITUONG_ID = DT.DOITUONG_ID AND DTK3.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND DTK3.NGAYTRONGTUAN = 3 LEFT JOIN TM_KHODUOC KD3 ON KD3.KHODUOC_ID = DTK3.KHODUOC_ID LEFT JOIN TM_DOITUONG_KHODUOC DTK4 ON DTK4.DOITUONG_ID = DT.DOITUONG_ID AND DTK4.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND DTK4.NGAYTRONGTUAN = 4 LEFT JOIN TM_KHODUOC KD4 ON KD4.KHODUOC_ID = DTK4.KHODUOC_ID LEFT JOIN TM_DOITUONG_KHODUOC DTK5 ON DTK5.DOITUONG_ID = DT.DOITUONG_ID AND DTK5.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND DTK5.NGAYTRONGTUAN = 5 LEFT JOIN TM_KHODUOC KD5 ON KD5.KHODUOC_ID = DTK5.KHODUOC_ID LEFT JOIN TM_DOITUONG_KHODUOC DTK6 ON DTK6.DOITUONG_ID = DT.DOITUONG_ID AND DTK6.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND DTK6.NGAYTRONGTUAN = 6 LEFT JOIN TM_KHODUOC KD6 ON KD6.KHODUOC_ID = DTK6.KHODUOC_ID LEFT JOIN TM_DOITUONG_KHODUOC DTK7 ON DTK7.DOITUONG_ID = DT.DOITUONG_ID AND DTK7.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND DTK7.NGAYTRONGTUAN = 7 LEFT JOIN TM_KHODUOC KD7 ON KD7.KHODUOC_ID = DTK7.KHODUOC_ID WHERE DT.ACTIVE = '1' AND DT.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
SELECT K.KHODUOC_ID, K.TENKHO FROM TM_KHODUOC K WHERE K.TAMNGUNG = '0' AND K.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
statements.insert:
select TM_DOITUONG_KHODUOC_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_DOITUONG_KHODUOC ( DOITUONG_KHODUOC_ID , DOITUONG_ID , KHODUOC_ID , NGAYTRONGTUAN , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# ,#DOITUONG_ID# , #KHODUOC_ID# , #NGAYTRONGTUAN# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update: update TM_DOITUONG_KHODUOC set DOITUONG_ID = #DOITUONG_ID# , KHODUOC_ID = #KHODUOC_ID# , NGAYTRONGTUAN = #NGAYTRONGTUAN# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where DOITUONG_KHODUOC_ID = '$DOITUONG_KHODUOC_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TM_DOITUONG_KHODUOC where DOITUONG_KHODUOC_ID = '$DOITUONG_KHODUOC_ID$'
select * from TM_DOITUONG_KHODUOC where DOITUONG_ID = '$DOITUONG_ID$' AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND NGAYTRONGTUAN = '$NGAYTRONGTUAN$'
statements.insert:
select TM_NUT_SANPHAM_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_NUT_SANPHAM ( SANPHAM_ID , MASANPHAM , TENSANPHAM , LOAISANPHAM_ID , DONVITINH_ID , HANGSANXUAT_ID , TAMNGUNG , BENHVIEN_ID , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT ) values ( #ID# , #MASANPHAM# , #TENSANPHAM# , #LOAISANPHAM_ID# , #DONVITINH_ID# , #HANGSANXUAT_ID# , #TAMNGUNG# , #BENHVIEN_ID# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# )
statements.update: update TM_NUT_SANPHAM set MASANPHAM = #MASANPHAM# , TENSANPHAM = #TENSANPHAM# , LOAISANPHAM_ID = #LOAISANPHAM_ID# , DONVITINH_ID = #DONVITINH_ID# , HANGSANXUAT_ID = #HANGSANXUAT_ID# , TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# , NGUOITAO_ID = #NGUOITAO_ID# , NGAYTAO = #NGAYTAO# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where SANPHAM_ID = '$SANPHAM_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TM_NUT_SANPHAM where SANPHAM_ID = '$SANPHAM_ID$'

SELECT * FROM TM_NUT_LOAISANPHAM
TM_NUT_LOAISANPHAM.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
ORDER BY TM_NUT_LOAISANPHAM.MALOAISANPHAM

SELECT * FROM TM_HANGSANXUAT
TM_HANGSANXUAT.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
ORDER BY TM_HANGSANXUAT.MAHANGSANXUAT

SELECT SP.SANPHAM_ID , SP.MASANPHAM , SP.TENSANPHAM , LSP.TENLOAISANPHAM , SP.LOAISANPHAM_ID , SP.HANGSANXUAT_ID , SP.DONVITINH_ID , DVT.TENDONVITINH , HSX.TENHANGSANXUAT , SP.TAMNGUNG , SP.BENHVIEN_ID FROM TM_NUT_SANPHAM SP INNER JOIN TM_NUT_LOAISANPHAM LSP ON SP.LOAISANPHAM_ID = LSP.LOAISANPHAM_ID INNER JOIN TM_DONVITINH DVT ON SP.DONVITINH_ID = DVT.DONVITINH_ID LEFT JOIN TM_HANGSANXUAT HSX ON SP.HANGSANXUAT_ID = HSX.HANGSANXUAT_ID WHERE SP.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT SP.SANPHAM_ID , SP.MASANPHAM , SP.TENSANPHAM , SP.LOAISANPHAM_ID , SP.HANGSANXUAT_ID , SP.DONVITINH_ID , SP.TAMNGUNG , SP.BENHVIEN_ID FROM TM_NUT_SANPHAM SP WHERE SP.LOAISANPHAM_ID = '$LOAISANPHAM_ID$'
SELECT DVT.* FROM TM_DONVITINH DVT WHERE DVT.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
statements.insert:
select TM_NUT_BUOIAN_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_NUT_BUOIAN( BUOIAN_ID , MABUOIAN , TENBUOIAN , LOAI , TUGIO , DENGIO , GIOTONGHOP , BENHVIEN_ID , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT ) values ( #ID# , #MABUOIAN# , #TENBUOIAN# , #LOAI# , #TUGIO# , #DENGIO# , #GIOTONGHOP# , #BENHVIEN_ID# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# )
statements.update: update TM_NUT_BUOIAN set MABUOIAN = #MABUOIAN# , TENBUOIAN = #TENBUOIAN# , LOAI = #LOAI# , TUGIO = #TUGIO# , DENGIO = #DENGIO# , GIOTONGHOP = #GIOTONGHOP# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# , NGUOITAO_ID = #NGUOITAO_ID# , NGAYTAO = #NGAYTAO# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGAYCAPNHAT_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where BUOIAN_ID = '$BUOIAN_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TM_NUT_BUOIAN where BUOIAN_ID = '$BUOIAN_ID$'

SELECT B.BUOIAN_ID , B.MABUOIAN , B.TENBUOIAN , B.LOAI , TO_CHAR(B.TUGIO,'HH24:Mi') TUGIO , TO_CHAR(B.DENGIO,'HH24:Mi') DENGIO , TO_CHAR(B.GIOTONGHOP,'HH24:Mi') GIOTONGHOP , B.BENHVIEN_ID FROM TM_NUT_BUOIAN B WHERE B.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

insert into TT_KSK_CONGTY( MACONGTY ,TENCONGTY ,TENCONGTY_EN ,DIACHI ,DIENTHOAI ,FAX ,EMAIL ,MASOTHUE ,GIAMDOC ,NGUOILIENHE ,DIENTHOAI_LH ,NGUOILIENHE2 ,DIENTHOAI_LH2 ,NUOCNGOAI ,NHANUOC ,HESO ,TAMNGUNG ,BENHVIEN_ID ,NGAYTAO ,NGUOITAO_ID ,NGAYCAPNHAT ,NGUOICAPNHAT_ID ) values ( #MACONGTY# ,#TENCONGTY# ,#TENCONGTY_EN# ,#DIACHI# ,#DIENTHOAI# ,#FAX# ,#EMAIL# ,#MASOTHUE# ,#GIAMDOC# ,#NGUOILIENHE# ,#DIENTHOAI_LH# ,#NGUOILIENHE2# ,#DIENTHOAI_LH2# ,#NUOCNGOAI# ,#NHANUOC# ,#HESO# ,#TAMNGUNG# ,#BENHVIEN_ID# ,#NGAYTAO# ,#NGUOITAO_ID# ,#NGAYCAPNHAT# ,#NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# ) SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY()

update TT_KSK_CONGTY set MACONGTY = #MACONGTY# ,TENCONGTY = #TENCONGTY# ,TENCONGTY_EN = #TENCONGTY_EN# ,DIACHI = #DIACHI# ,DIENTHOAI = #DIENTHOAI# ,FAX = #FAX# ,EMAIL = #EMAIL# ,MASOTHUE = #MASOTHUE# ,GIAMDOC = #GIAMDOC# ,NGUOILIENHE = #NGUOILIENHE# ,DIENTHOAI_LH = #DIENTHOAI_LH# ,NGUOILIENHE2 = #NGUOILIENHE2# ,DIENTHOAI_LH2 = #DIENTHOAI_LH2# ,NUOCNGOAI = #NUOCNGOAI# ,NHANUOC = #NHANUOC# ,HESO = #HESO# ,TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG# ,BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# ,NGAYTAO = #NGAYTAO# ,NGUOITAO_ID = #NGUOITAO_ID# ,NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# ,NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# where CONGTY_ID = '$CONGTY_ID$'
delete from TT_KSK_CONGTY where CONGTY_ID='$CONGTY_ID$'
select * from TT_KSK_CONGTY WHERE BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

statements.statement: delete from TM_SYS_APPSETTINGS where SETTING_ID = '$SETTING_ID$'
